New Records: Pathum Nissanka hit the seventh fifty of his T20I career
Wanindu Hasaranga contributed significantly with his bowling performance
Key Match Events: Pakistan's early wickets and inability to convert starts
Sri Lanka's tight bowling in the powerplay
Pakistan's collapse after Babar Azam's dismissal
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's victory was a strong performance and sets them up for the final
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Dubai, which has a history of 17 victories by chasing sides in the last 20 T20Is
